Class Branch

java.lang.Object
  Branch

public class Branch
extends Object

The Branch class stores information about a branch

Version:
04/03/2013
Author:
S.D.Wheeler

public Branch(String n)
Creates a Branch with a unique id number and a name initialised from parameter values,

Parameters:

addRiderPoints

public void addRiderPoints(int rId,
                           int pts)
allows the rider to gain points for partaking in a rally.

Parameters:
rId - this selects the rider to add the points too.
pts - this is the value to be added to the riders points.

findRally

public Rally findRally(String rCode)
returns the Rally if it is contained in the allRallies collection as a Rally object.

Parameters:
rCode - this selects the rally to be searched for.
Returns:
value returned is the Rally, if it is contained in the allRallies collection as a Rally object.

findRider

public Rider findRider(int rId)
returns the Rider if it is contained in the allRiders collection as a Rider object.

Parameters:
rId - this selects the rider to be searched for.
Returns:
value returned is the rider, if it is contained in the allRiders collection as a Rider object.

getAllBranchInfo

public String getAllBranchInfo()
returns the full details of the Branch including all the riders, all the rallies and each rider booked and the list of venues, as a String.

Returns:
value returned is the full details of the Branch including all the riders, all the rallies and each rider booked and the list of venues, as a String.

getAllRallies

returns all of the rallies that are at the branch as a String.

Returns:
value returned is a list of all the rallies that are at the branch as a String.

getContenders

public String getContenders(int pts)
returns all of the riders that are at the branch who's points are greater than the designated amount as a String.

Parameters:
pts - this is the value to be added to the riders points.
Returns:
value returned is a list of all the riders that are at the branch who's points are greater than the designated amount as a String.

isRally

public boolean isRally(String rCode)
returns whether the Rally is contained in the allRallies collection as a boolean.

Parameters:
rCode - this selects the rally to be searched for.
Returns:
value returned is whether the Rally is contained in the allRallies collection as a boolean.

allows the rider to be booked onto a particular rally.

Parameters:

ral - this selects the rally the rider is to be booked onto.

leaveRally

public void leaveRally(Rider ride,
                       Rally ral)
allows the rider to leave a particular rally.

Parameters:
ride - this selects the rider to be removed from the rally.
ral - this selects the rally the rider is to be removed from.
